domain.name: Domain
domain.description: Your public domain for remote access (e.g. ha.example.com). Leave empty for LAN-only mode.

certfile.name: Certificate file
certfile.description: TLS certificate filename inside the /ssl/ directory.

keyfile.name: Key file
keyfile.description: TLS private key filename inside the /ssl/ directory.

enable_turn.name: Enable TURN
enable_turn.description: Enable the coturn TURN/STUN relay for WebRTC camera and voice streams.

tunnel_enabled.name: Enable Tunnel
tunnel_enabled.description: Enable Cloudflare Tunnel for secure remote access without port forwarding.

cf_api_token.name: Cloudflare API Token
cf_api_token.description: Cloudflare API token with Tunnel:Edit and DNS:Edit permissions. Leave empty if baked into the image at build time.

cf_account_id.name: Cloudflare Account ID
cf_account_id.description: Cloudflare account identifier. Found on the dashboard overview page.

cf_zone_id.name: Cloudflare Zone ID
cf_zone_id.description: Cloudflare zone identifier for the tunnel domain. Found on the domain overview page.

cf_domain.name: Tunnel Domain
cf_domain.description: Base domain for tunnel subdomains (e.g. vipsy.example.com). Unique IDs are prepended automatically.
